New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 51 runs off 25 balls, setting a new record for the fastest 50 runs in a T20I match.
Key Match Events: India won by 56 runs, their highest margin of victory in the tournament.
Suryakumar Yadav's outstanding performance was a key turning point in the match.
Pre-Game Insights: India elected to bat first after winning the toss. The match was delayed at the start due to initial delay.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav was named Player of the Match for his exceptional performance. The victory was a significant moment in India's World Cup campaign.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the 1848th T20I, a historical milestone. The innings flow and key contributions from both teams were notable.
Others: The match was played at the Sydney Cricket Ground with umpires Ahsan Raza, Michael Gough, and others involved.
